Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: yetazezikibetinimi negeri beyifa gilets’i፡፡ agariwochinimi tewachewi፡፡
(inesumi) ineziya ke’alahi gari lela amilakini yaderegu nachewi፡፡ be’irigit’imi (fits’ameyachewini) wedefiti yawik’alu፡፡
anitemi bemiluti negeri libihi yemit’ebi mehonuni be’irigit’i inawik’aleni፡፡
getahinimi kemamesigeni gari at’irawi kesegajochumi huni፡፡
ye’alahi ti‘izazi met’a፤ silezihi atasichekuluti፤ kemayigebawi hulu t’era kemiyagarutimi hulu lak’e፤

kebarochu bemishawi sewi layi mela’ikitini kera’iyi gari befek’adu yaweridali (kehadiwochini bek’it’ati) asit’enik’ik’u፤ ineho kene bek’eri lela amilaki yelemi፤ firunyimi maletini (asitawik’u bemaleti yaweridali)፡፡
semayatinina midirini be’iwineti fet’ere kemiyagaruti hulu t’era፡፡
sewini kefitiweti t’ebita fet’erewi፡፡ keziyami irisu wediyawinu (tinisa’eni bemekadi) gilits’i tekerakari yihonali፡፡
gimelini፣ kebitini፣ fiyelinimi beriswa (biridi mekelakeya) muk’eti t’ik’imochimi yalubati sitihoni le’inanite fet’erelachihu፡፡ keriswami tibelalachihu፡፡
le’inanitemi be’iriswa wede marefiyawa bemitimeliswati gize bemitasemaruwatimi gize wibeti alachihu፡፡
